item.title: DOGE has ‘broken into’ the U.S. Institute for Peace after repeatedly being denied entry. Its former leader is calling it an ‘illegal takeover’
item.description: "It was unlike anything I have experienced in my professional career," the organization's chief security officer told Fortune.

item.title: Trump-backed World Liberty Financial raises $550 million in WLFI token sales
item.description: “The token sales are just the beginning."

item.title: Rigid work models won’t survive AI. Here’s what will
item.description: Companies that invest in skills-driven guilds will attract the best talent and future-proof their workforce.

item.title: A free trip to Mars, free burgers for life, and $1 million: what a perfect March Madness bracket could win you as Warren Buffett and Elon Musk chip in
item.description: Billionaires are offering millions of dollars in prizes for the lucky basketball fan who can select a perfect March Madness bracket.

item.title: Google DeepMind CEO says that humans have just over 5 years before AI will outsmart them
item.description: Demis Hassabis, Elon Musk, and Sam Altman have all warned that artificial general intelligence (AGI) will outwit humans in the near future.
